title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.80 - Machine construction
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.80 - Machine construction

State Regulations

Food vending machines are to be constructed and maintained to protect food furnished from contamination under conditions at the machine location. These conditions include temperature, dust and dirt, chemicals as dust, fumes and vapors, power failure and vandalism. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.80

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
